name: Kristen Stewart celebrity inspired Ram's Horn tobacco tab necklace charm silver
description:
This listing is for a Ram's Horn tobacco tab charm necklace inspired by the one seen on Kristen Stewart lately!

Always so trendy and vintage loving, Kristen has been seen with this necklace traveling and visiting Europe for shooting her new movie.

After the famous dove necklace, this seems to be the new main piece of jewelry in Kristen's life.

My replica is made of a 25mm small metal tab on which I applied the Ram's horn high quality image (still leaving its beautiful vintage look). 
The image has been treated with acryl varnish and clear resin to protect it. 
Through the top of the charm I has punched a little whole to put it on a jump ring and silver necklace - Just like Kristen's! 
As a little extra I have added a pyramid silver pendant. (Kristen wears an unidentified charm with her Ram's Horn tab).

The length of necklace is about 70cm of chain (can be custom made in length). 
Closes with a matching silver plated lobster clasp.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask- I'll gladly answer!

Please note that I ask 3-5 business days after purchase to ship the item out because they are all hand made and resin takes 1-2 days to dry! =)

Please note that I only accept paypal payments. 
Please make sure you understand my shop's policies. 
Thank you!

Disclaimer: 
This item is an inspired replica. 
I am not in any way associated with the legal copyright owner or original manufacturer of this item. 
I do not represent or am in any way associated with Kristen Stewart or Jennifer Lawrence or any other celebrity mentioned or shown on this page. 
Eventual images shown are merely used for comparison. 
No copyright infringement is intended.

name: Flag Triangle bracelet beaded red gold bracelet wristband celebrity inspired
description:
This is a listing for a beaded triangle bracelet that has been spotted on celebrities with very often!

My replica is made of a very thin beautiful chain bracelet to which I connected the flag pendant.
The pendant itself is a special piece of work as I have woven those extremely small colored beads on a silk string in matching red color and brought them into this flag shape.
On top of the red beads you find the characteristic golden beads of this bracelet.
The chain itself is also interwoven with the string of the pendant. Like that I guarantee highest comfort and flexibility of the chain.
This is a very delicate and special piece.
If you would like to have this made in black or blue, or another color of your choice, please talk to me.
The bracelet closes with a matching golden round clasp.

Measurements:
Length of bracelet: approximately 18cm
Flag pendant: 1,2cm
Can be made as custom length as well!!

IF WANTED I CAN MAKE THIS ON A SILVER CHAIN AS WELL. JUST TALK TO ME!

Due to the high amount of work on these bracelets, each bracelet will be custom made for you! I ask 3 work days for production.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask- I'll answer gladly!
Please note that I only accept paypal payments.
Please read my shop's policy before buying and ask for other shipping options.
Thank you! =)

name: Dove necklace white dove gold or silver jewelry celebrity inspired charm pendant
description:
This listing is for one silver or gold frame pendant with matching necklace and clasp.

This is cute, celebrity inspired frame pendant necklace.

The rectangular silver colored or gold colored pendant shows our new high quality print of a white dove on it's red background.
The picture is wrapped in golf leaf which I applied by hand, leaving a frame around the picture.

The surface of this pendant is filled with clear resin (two component resin) to protect the image. The resin gives it a very characteristic and beautiful shine.

Each pendant will look slightly different due to the fact that each one is hand made.
I will do my best to make them all look very similar though!

The pendant measures 10mm x 15mm
It comes on a 40cm gold or silver plated necklace with matching golden clasp.
Chain can be custom made in length up to 1meter.
If you would like to have this necklace with a sacred heart image or an image of your own choice, please contact me before buying!

Please note that I only accept paypal payments.
Please read my shop's policy before buying and ask for other shipping options. 
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask- I'll answer gladly!
Thank you!

name: Thin gold band ring knuckle celebrity inspired stack ring
description:
This listing is for a ring inspired many celebrities' thin gold ring!
They have been seen with this beautiful super thin gold ring on their index finger!

The ring is extremely thin- about 0,8mm and probably one of the most comfortable pieces of jewelry you can imagine! You will barely feel it on your finger but people will notice this extraordinary look!
The finish of the ring is very shiny.

The ring is available in US size 6, 7 and 8. Please state the size you want in a message to me after buying.
The ring is beautiful on its own but you can also stack it as seen in the pictures!

This is a VERY close replica to the fashionable ring seen in Hollywood as it has the very exact thinness that you will find only in few rings!! 

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask- I'll answer gladly!
Please note that I only accept paypal payments.
Please read my shop's policy before buying and ask for other shipping methods.
Thank you!

name: Celebrity inspired Beach boys vintage iron on tee shirt
description:
This listing is for a Beach boys vintage iron on t-shirt.


This is no replica but the real deal!!
I had very much luck to come across 10 original vintage iron ons from the 1970s. They come from a stock of a t-shirt shop that closed and these were still in stock back from the 70s!!!
They are identical to the print as seen on some celebrities shirts lately. No replica has all these beautiful details, such as the indian's face or the horse's head. 
Why settle for a replica if you can be one of the few to get the real deal?
Only the original will give you these charming "used" vintage look!

The shirt comes in men's size S, M, L and XL.

Please note that each shirt/ print will come out a little different because they are all vintage and never 100% the same.
Using an iron on when applying heat to it, the color comes off the paper and goes onto the shirt.

As you can see in the picture I have made a shirt for myself. It is very high quality made from 100% cotton. Super soft and comfortable with round neck.
I use size S.

Measurements of shirts:

Size S:
Measured on shirt laid out flat.
Bust = 51cm (armpit to armpit)
Length = 61cm (from neck to back)
Sleeve = 18cm long.

For each size up you can add about 2cm to each measurement.

Shirts ship out in a registered and trackable package.

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask- I'll gladly answer.
Please note that I only accept paypal payments.
Please read my shop's policy and ask for other shipping methods.
Thank you!
